name: brexit rush
description:
This game can teach you EU and UK flags!  Did you know the UK had quite so many flags?

Press space to jump.  Avoid flags from the European Union.  Get flags from the UK constituent countries, crown dependencies, and overseas territories.

Made for the One Hour Game Jam #193!  Apologies that it isn't the best game, but not bad for (quite a bit longer than) one hour.
